mapper.select: select * from t_ammeter where ammeter_no = #{ammeterNo} and enprNo = #[enprNo]
mapper.update: update t_ammeter set read_time = #{readTime}, read_value = #{readValue}, pre_read_time = #{preReadTime}, pre_read_value = #{preReadValue}, day_amount = #{dayAmount}, month_amount = #{monthAmount}, state = #{state} where ammeter_id = #{ammeterId}
mapper.select: select * from t_ammeter where id_delete = 0 and c_id =#{cid} and state = 1

select meter.ammeter_id, meter.ammeter_no, meter.u_id, meter.c_id, meter.install_time, meter.read_time, meter.read_value, meter.pre_read_time, meter.pre_read_value, meter.day_amount, meter.month_amount, meter.state, meter.enprNo from ( select u_id from t_user where u_no = #{uNo} and enprNo = #{enprNo} and is_delete = 0 ) u left join t_ammeter meter on u.u_id = meter.u_id where meter.is_delete = 0
